title: The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God proposed and stated, by considering these questions : Qu. I. Whether things indifferent used in divine worship (or, whether there be any things indifferent in the worship of God?) :  Qu. II. Whether a restraint of our liberty in the use of such indifferent things be a violation of it?
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
publisher: Printed by J. Redmayne, Jun. for Fincham Gardiner ...,
notes: Attributed to John Williams.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Attributed also to Edward Bagshaw.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
